articles.description: After winning 8 titles with Mercedes and having a net worth of $1 billion, Christian Horner feels Toto Wolff does not know how to run a team.
articles.content: Toto Wolffs recent comments on Max Verstappen and Red Bull didnt go down well with Christian Horner. Reacting to that, the Red Bull team principal said that his rival lacks the understanding of runni… [+2628 chars]
